generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, with vehicles and pedestrians around it.
- sidewalk: There is a sidewalk on the right side of the road, where bicycles are parked and pedestrians are walking.
- building: Several buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including commercial establishments with signs.
- wall: A low concrete wall runs along the sidewalk on the right side of the street.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
- traffic sign: A circular "No Stopping" sign is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees line both sides of the street, providing shade.
- terrain: There is a small patch of grass visible on the sidewalk near the bicycles.
- sky: The sky is visible through the tree canopy, appearing overcast.
- person: Several people are visible in the image, including pedestrians on the sidewalk and a person riding a bicycle.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the sides of the road, and a black van is driving in the middle of the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
